TopicTitle: When will KSP v1 be released?

Articles.Content: What are the long-term goals for SQUAD? At what point will the game be in Beta? Will it continue to be updated forever?
That is a weee bit early to ask that now, you know, 22 updates in

Their long term goal is a complete game. Nobody has any idea when the game will enter or eave beta. Nothing lasts forever, but from the way things look I'd say we're good for several more years at least.
Not for a long time. I have my theories, but it's bad luck to predict things so early...
Could be in a couple of years, or they could call it a wrap and make 0.22 the final version.
To distill all possible speculation and guessing into one simple answer: KSP v1.0 will be released when it's ready!

It will be released SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢

The tiny print: SoonÃ¢â€žÂ¢ is a registered trademark of WhenIt'sReady Inc.
I think the developers mentioned somewhere that the game is still thought to be in development for at least another year to a year and a half. Alas, we do not know exactly how long.

In the big stream when they mentioned potential expansion packs that made everyone really angry...sometimes 'round april-ish(or just before), they mentioned that they've got about eighteen months of development left. Give or take, obviously.

So we've got at least a year yet until they're done. Might take them two, if they come up with some amazing ideas near the end to cram in all last minute like.
